
The standard library {\tt patchfile} package implements support for patching content into sourcefiles in regions delimited by
\begin{verbatim}
#    # Do not edit this or following lines --- they are autobuilt.
#    ...
#    # Do not edit this or preceding lines --- they are autobuilt.
\end{verbatim}

The {\tt patchfile} package implements the \ahrefloc{api:Patchfile}{Patchfile} api.

The {\tt patchfile} package source code is in \ahrefloc{src/lib/make-library-glue/patchfile.pkg}{src/lib/make-library-glue/patchfile.pkg}.

See also:  \ahrefloc{pkg:patchfiles}{patchfiles}.
